reviewText: No problems with cd. Go Cards!!
I thought it was great when it happened.  Wanted to remember it.
Awesome DVD about an SUPER AWESOME upset win by the Louisville Cardinals!!

This is a great compacted version of the ESPN broadcast, without the commercials.  The problem is, the crowd noise is considerably subdued compared to the original broadcast.  Announcers almost sound like they're in a private room all by themselves.  Loses a lot of the excitement of the game.
I just pre-ordered 2013 Sugar Bowl bluray disc from booksellers Barnes and Noble.  Since I watched the game, I know it is entertaining and Coach Strong works magic!
It is 2013 and there is not a bluray disc being produced of the Allstate Sugar Bowl.  This is a crying shame that Team Marketing and Wax Works Inc will not produce the bluray of this game.
